properties.areaDesc: Coastal Waters of Northern USVI and Culebra out 10 NM; Mona Passage Southward to 17N; Coastal Waters OF Northwestern Puerto Rico out 10 NM; Coastal Waters OF Southwestern Puerto Rico out 10 NM; Anegada Passage Southward to 17N
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 23 at 9:01PM AST until January 26 at 2:00AM AST by NWS San Juan PR
properties.description:
...A NORTHERLY SWELL WILL IMPACT THE REGION BEGINNING FRIDAY...

.A swell, associated with low pressure to our north, will affect
local waters Friday morning into Sunday. Seas are expected to
build between 6-8 feet across the Atlantic waters and passages.

* WHAT...Seas 6 to 8 feet expected, with occasional seas to 10
feet.

* WHERE...Anegada Passage, Mona Passage, nearshore waters of
western Puerto Rico, and nearshore waters of northern USVI and
Culebra.

* WHEN...From 8 PM Friday to 2 AM AST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM FRIDAY TO 2 AM AST SUNDAY
